TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit UserTrackingLocationCollection extends System.Collections.Generic.List`1<class System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> mantém dois <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection> objetos: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> Especifica os parâmetros usados para eventos de status de atividade de correspondência e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> Especifica os parâmetros usados para excluir eventos de status de atividade de correspondência.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe .

remarks.format: ## Remarks O construtor padrão inicializa o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection> para uma lista vazia.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> locations) cil managed

Docs.summary: Inicializa uma nova instância do classe usando uma lista de locais de usuário.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection> é inicializada para conter o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objetos especificados em `locations`.

Docs.exception: é uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).
